options.content:
Individual Globus Tasks by Country

  • This dashboard shows per-Globus Task level data, given a particular source and destination country.
  • The table shows the volume, rate, and duration (in hours, minutes and seconds) for each task.
  • Click on the timestamp of an individual flow to show more detailed information about that task.
  • Globus Task endpoints are de-identified, and private data sources are marked "Private".
  • Private Task data rates and totals are available via the toggle at the top of this dashboard.
  • All times are displayed in browser local time.

targets.query: meta.src_country_name:$src AND meta.dst_country_name:$dest AND (meta.src_organization:${confidential:raw} AND meta.dst_organization:${confidential:raw}) AND meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND (( (!(_exists_:meta.src_ip)) OR meta.src_ip:${subnet.regex}*) OR ( (!(_exists_:meta.dst_ip)) OR meta.dst_ip:${subnet.regex}*))

title: What do individual Globus tasks by country look like?
